title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - London, UK
description:
The London Software Craftsmanship Community is hosting five (yes, you heard that right) code retreats across London. Please head over toÂ our site on Meetup (http://www.meetup.com/london-software-craftsmanship/) to pick one (and please, only one) of our code retreats and register. 
Registration opens on Friday 29th November at 12:00pm.
